name: hackathon-bh

scripts.build-client: npm run clean && parcel build client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.dev-client: npm run clean && parcel client/src/index.html --out-dir client/dist
scripts.clean: if exist .cache (rmdir /s/q .cache) && if exist client\dist (rmdir /s/q client\dist)

author: Club5
description: A project developed for ethereum hackathon in bh
